page.title: 10Rural transport
page.content: Helena's report The nearest railway station from Coads Green is Liskeard which is about 11 miles away. There are two bus lines that pass through the grid,the 76 and the 77.The 76 is the most frequent coming from Plymouth via Callington to Launceston. There are 5 buses a day on this service.The 77 runs 1 bus on Tuesday and Friday only.Few people use the bus for commuting or shopping.The service is used by old people or people without a car .where I live its 2.5 miles to the nearest bus stop.Almost everybody in our villagehas a car. It is not a good service if you want to go out in the evening as the last bus back from Launceston is at 17.15. To get anywhere in our grid it is essential to have a car.
